A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They betrayed Luke Skywalker's character. Trying to murder your moody nephew and abandoning your sister\, best friend and your cause is not in Luke's character.  Superman-style Space Leia scene is god-awful.  Finn and Rose's storyline was utterly ineffectual and pointless.  As a main character\, Finn has done basically nothing since the beginning.  Snoke is totally underdeveloped.  Captain Phasma again lets us down.  Rey's backstory was a letdown.  Total storyline is jumbled\, and there were a lot of missed opportunities that leave us nothing to look forward to in episode 9.   To end on a positive note\, I enjoyed Rose's sister's scene at the beginning in the bomber\, the Vice Admiral's self-sacrifice via hyperspace made for a beautiful shot\, and the slave boy's scene at the very end was moving.
